data.title: Christiane Amanpour
data.text:
Born: 12-Jan-1958

Birthplace: London, England

Gender: Female

Religion: Roman Catholic

Race or Ethnicity: Middle Eastern

Sexual orientation: Straight

Occupation: Journalist

Nationality: England

Executive summary: Host of ABC's This Week

Long-time chief foreign correspondent for CNN, now host of This Week on ABC.

Father: Mohammad Amanpour

Mother: Patricia

Husband: James P. Rubin (m. 1998, one son)

Son: Darius John Rubin (b. 27-Mar-2000)

High School: Holy Cross Convent, Buckinghamshire

High School: New Hall School, England

University: BA Journalism, University of Rhode Island

CNN Foreign Correspondent (1992-2010)

Peabody 1993

Polk Award 1993

Polk Award 1996

Peabody 1998

Edward R. Murrow Award 2002

Emmy 2005

Commander of the British Empire 2007

American Academy of Arts and Sciences 2010

Committee to Protect Journalists Board of Directors

Society of Professional Journalists Fellow

English Ancestry Maternal

Iranian Ancestry Paternal

TELEVISION

This Week Host (2010-)

60 Minutes Correspondent (1996-2005)

FILMOGRAPHY AS ACTOR

Zoolander 2 (4-Feb-2016)

Trash (7-Oct-2014)

Iron Man 2 (26-Apr-2010) Â· Herself

War Photographer (2001)
